com.webs.api
Interface AppApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppApiImpl, WebsApiClient
public interface AppApi

Interface which specifies all app-related calls to the Webs API

Author:
Patrick Carroll

Method Summary
 List<App> getAllApps()
          Get all publicly available apps
 App getApp(AppId appId)
          Get the app corresponding to the given appId
 List<App> getApps(SiteId siteId)
          Get all publicly installed apps on the site corresponding to siteId
 void installApp(AppId appId, SiteId siteId)
          Install the given app on a site.
 void uninstallApp(AppId appId, SiteId siteId)
          Uninstall the given app from a site.
 

Method Detail

getAllApps

List<App> getAllApps()
Get all publicly available apps

Returns:
A list of all publicly available apps on Webs.com

getApp

App getApp(AppId appId)
Get the app corresponding to the given appId

Parameters:
appId - The id of the corresponding app
Returns:
The app that was found or null if none are found

getApps

List<App> getApps(SiteId siteId)
Get all publicly installed apps on the site corresponding to siteId

Parameters:
siteId - The unique id corresponding to the site
Returns:
A list of all publicly available apps

installApp

void installApp(AppId appId,
                SiteId siteId)
Install the given app on a site. This method requires a valid OAuth token with site owner permissions

Parameters:
appId - The unique id corresponding to the app to be installed
siteId - The unique id corresponding to the site

uninstallApp

void uninstallApp(AppId appId,
                  SiteId siteId)
Uninstall the given app from a site. This method requires a valid OAuth token with site owner permissions

Parameters:
appId - The unique id corresponding to the app to be uninstalled
siteId - The unique id corresponding to the site
